Navigation

Utility Header (Optional)

User 1234 Atlanta, GA
*NOTE: Use only in conjunction with Primary Header.
*NOTE: Each util-section followed by text will give the gray then white text. 
<div class="utility-header">
    <label class="util-section">Welcome</label> User
    <label class="util-section">Store#</label> 1234
    <label class="util-section">Location</label> Atlanta, GA
</div>

Primary Header

Active Link
Nav Link
Nav Link
*NOTE: header-info section contains: product-info which is Product Name and user-info which can contain any secondary information, or not included at all.
*NOTE: header-actions section can contain any icon (up to 6) and corresponding link name text.
*NOTE: Requires a div with content section immediately after to ensure proper positioning and scrolling.
*NOTE: On mobile: header-actions will be shifted and fixed to bottom of the screen. 
<div class="header">
    <div class="header-logo">
        <i class="icon_homedepot"></i>
    </div>
    <div class="header-info">
        <label class="product-info">Product Name</label>
        <label class="user-info">User Name | Store #0000 | Atlanta, GA</label>
    </div>
    <div class="header-search">
        <input type="search" placeholder="Search Here"/>
        <i class="icon_search"></i>
    </div>
    <div class="header-actions">
        <div class="active"><i class="icon_bell"></i>Active Link</div>
        <div><i class="icon_cart"></i>Nav Link</div>
        <div><i class="icon_exit-to-app"></i>Nav Link</div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="content"></div>

BREADCRUMBS

Default

Page 1 Page 2 Page 3 Current Page 
<div class="breadcrumb-nav">
    <span class="breadcrumb">Page 1</span>
    <span class="breadcrumb">Page 2</span>
    <span class="breadcrumb">Page 3</span>
    <span class="breadcrumb active">Current Page</span>
</div>

With Back Button (Optional)

Back Page 1 Page 2 Page 3 Current Page 
<div class="breadcrumb-nav">
    <span class="breadcrumb back">Back</span>
    <span class="breadcrumb">Page 1</span>
    <span class="breadcrumb">Page 2</span>
    <span class="breadcrumb">Page 3</span>
    <span class="breadcrumb active">Current Page</span>
</div>

Pagination

Default
1 2 3
Large
1 2 3 4 5 6
Medium
1 2 3 4 5
Small 
<div class="pagination-nav" id="pagination1">
    <span class="page left"></span>
    <span class="page">01</span>
    <span class="page">02</span>
    <span class="page">03</span>
    <span class="page right"></span>
</div>
 
<div class="pagination-nav md" id="pagination2">
    <span class="page left"></span>
    <span class="page">01</span>
    <span class="page">02</span>
    <span class="page">03</span>
    <span class="page">04</span>
    <span class="page">05</span>
    <span class="page">06</span>
    <span class="page right"></span>
</div>
 
<div class="pagination-nav sm" id="pagination3">
    <span class="page left"></span>
    <span class="page">01</span>
    <span class="page">02</span>
    <span class="page">03</span>
    <span class="page">04</span>
    <span class="page">05</span>
    <span class="page right"></span>
</div>

Compact
Large
Medium
Small 
<div class="pagination-nav compact" id="pagination4">
    <span class="page left"></span>
    <span class="page right"></span>
</div>
 
<div class="pagination-nav compact md" id="pagination5">
    <span class="page left"></span>
    <span class="page right"></span>
</div>
 
<div class="pagination-nav compact sm" id="pagination6">
    <span class="page left"></span>
    <span class="page right"></span>
</div>
 
Pagination.init("pagination4", 4, 1, paginationCallback);
 
Pagination.init("pagination5", 8, 1, paginationCallback);
 
Pagination.init("pagination6", 7, 1, paginationCallback);

JavaScript

DEFINITION:
Pagination.init(PAGINATION_NAV_ID, TOTAL_NUMBER_PAGES, PAGE_TO_START, PAGING_CALLBACK);
 *NOTE: PAGING_CALLBACK will receive current page number selected.
EXAMPLE:
Pagination.init("pagination1", 7, 1, pagingCallback);

STEPPER NAVIGATION

1
Completed Step
2
Editable Step
w/Sub Text
3
Error Step
w/Sub Text
4
Current Step
Step w/ Custon Icon
6
Plain Text
*NOTE: completed step overwrites circle with checkmark
*NOTE: editable step requires completed class and overwrites circle with pencil
*NOTE: error step requires completed class and overwrites circle with exclamation mark
*NOTE: green class can be applied to step class to show green color
*NOTE: active signifies current step in process
*NOTE: step-bar is required after every step except for last one 
<div class="stepper">
    <div class="step completed">
        <div class="step-circle">
            <span>1</span>
        </div>
        <div class="step-title">Completed Step</div>
    </div>
    <div class="step-bar"></div>
    <div class="step completed editable green">
        <div class="step-circle">
            <span>2</span>
        </div>
        <div class="step-title">Editable Step
            <div class="step-optional">w/Sub Text</div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="step-bar"></div>
    <div class="step completed error">
        <div class="step-circle">
            <span>3</span>
        </div>
        <div class="step-title">Error Step
            <div class="step-optional">w/Sub Text</div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="step-bar"></div>
    <div class="step active">
        <div class="step-circle">
            <span>4</span>
        </div>
        <div class="step-title">Current Step
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="step-bar"></div>
    <div class="step">
        <div class="step-circle">
            <i class="icon_cart"></i>
        </div>
        <div class="step-title">Step w/ Custon Icon
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="step-bar"></div>
    <div class="step">
        <div class="step-circle">
            <span>6</span>
        </div>
        <div class="step-title">Plain Text</div>
    </div>
</div>

STEPPER NAVIGATION VERTICAL

1
Completed Step
2
Editable Step
w/Sub Text
3
Error Step
w/Sub Text
4
Current Step
*NOTE: content class can be added to step-bar class and then markup can be put within the div to display content
Step w/ Custon Icon
6
Plain Text
 
<div class="stepper vertical">
    <div class="step completed">
        <div class="step-circle">
            <span>1</span>
        </div>
        <div class="step-title">Completed Step</div>
    </div>
    <div class="step-bar">
    </div>
    <div class="step completed editable green">
        <div class="step-circle">
            <span>2</span>
        </div>
        <div class="step-title">Editable Step
            <div class="step-optional">w/Sub Text</div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="step-bar"></div>
    <div class="step completed error">
        <div class="step-circle">
            <span>3</span>
        </div>
        <div class="step-title">Error Step
            <div class="step-optional">w/Sub Text</div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="step-bar"></div>
    <div class="step active">
        <div class="step-circle">
            <span>4</span>
        </div>
        <div class="step-title">Current Step
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="step-bar content">
        <p>this is some step content let's see what happens</p>
        <p>this is some step content let's see what happens</p>
    </div>
    <div class="step">
        <div class="step-circle">
            <i class="icon_cart"></i>
        </div>
        <div class="step-title">Step w/ Custon Icon
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="step-bar"></div>
    <div class="step">
        <div class="step-circle">
            <span>6</span>
        </div>
        <div class="step-title">Plain Text</div>
    </div>
</div>
